name: Mister Crowley
descriptions: Mister Crowley is a ghoul resident of Underworld in the Capital Wasteland around 2277.
Mister Crowley is a ghoul, who transformed over 20 years ago

Crowley and four other mercenaries - Dave, Jeff Strayer, Dukov, and Tara - were sent to Fort Constantine by Allistair Tenpenny to retrieve a rare weapon. During the mission, Crowley was locked in a room full of feral ghouls by Dukov, who wanted to increase his own share of the payout. Crowley survived the imprisonment and harbors a passionate resentment toward those who left him behind.
Mister Crowley can usually be found in either the Ninth Circle or his bed at Carol's Place in Underworld. He usually sleeps until 12 PM.
The Fallout 3 Official Game Guide uses the lyrics to Ozzy Osbourne's song Mr. Crowley in its walkthrough of You Gotta Shoot 'Em in the Head.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: What are you looking at? You'd think you'd never seen a Ghoul up close before.

topics.topic_text: Allistair Tenpenny is already dead.
topics.response_text: Damn! He's the one I most wanted to die by my hand.

topics.topic_text: No, I haven't. Say, does that hurt?
topics.response_text: No, it tickles. Everyone's got to be a comedian.{sarcasm}

topics.topic_text: Zombies couldn't make a place like Underworld.
topics.response_text: See? I knew you understood Ghouls.

topics.topic_text: Not for the right cause.
topics.response_text: Or the right money, heh?

topics.topic_text: Easy now. I've got nothing against Ghouls.
topics.response_text: Is that so?  Even if I call you a milk-sucking, mutant-loving, water-stealing whore?

topics.topic_text: This has been fun, but I've got things to do.
topics.response_text: Don't let me keep you.

topics.topic_text: Tell me where Fort Constantine is.
topics.response_text: It's pretty far away, northwest of here. Getting there won't do you any good though, not without those keys.

topics.topic_text: I don't need to stay here and listen to your lame insults.
topics.response_text: That's it. Run away like a smoothskin coward.

topics.topic: MS14GotKeysHave you got what I want?
topics.topic_text: Here's Strayer's key. Shot in the head, just like you asked.
topics.response_text: Marvelous! My list is growing shorter.

topics.topic_text: I put a bullet right between Ted Strayer's eyes. <Lie.>
topics.response_text: So, the Ghoul hater got what was coming to him. Good riddance.

topics.topic_text: I've decided not to kill Tenpenny. He made me a better offer.
topics.response_text: What! I hired you to kill him! I want him dead! You double crossed me.

topics.topic_text: Tenpenny is dead. I watched his brains splatter. <Lie.>
topics.response_text: Don't lie to me. The whole wasteland would be talking about it if Tenpenny died.

topics.topic_text: Sure. Take it. I don't have any use for it.
topics.response_text: Ah! My trophy. You've earned your reward.

topics.topic_text: Fucking brain eater!
topics.response_text: Are you comparing me to a...a...zombie!

topics.topic_text: Milk sucking? You shuffle stepping, brain eating, grave loving zombie!
topics.response_text: Another human bigot. It figures. Go mate with a Super Mutant.

topics.topic_text: Hey! I'm just looking to trade a drink for some gossip.
topics.response_text: Humph. Not sure I know anything of use, but I'll take that drink.

topics.topic_text: You want to kill humans? I thought it would just be Ghouls. No way.
topics.response_text: Watch the attitude, human. Right here, right now, there are more of us than there are of you.

topics.topic_text: The day isn't complete until I've killed something.
topics.response_text: Well aren't you the bloodthirsty type?

topics.topic_text: No way. I'm going to keep those keys for myself.
topics.response_text: What! You bastard, I'll kill you!

topics.topic_text: More caps? You've got a deal.
topics.response_text: Good. Oh, and I still want Tenpenny dead. That bastard really does hate Ghouls.

topics.topic_text: Um... I don't have it.
topics.response_text: Well, go get it!

topics.topic_text: All true, except for the part about the mutants, the water and the whore.
topics.response_text: Ha, ha! I like a human that knows his place. Too many of you think we're all just zombies.

topics.topic_text: Sounds simple enough.
topics.response_text: Then get going.

topics.topic_text: Those people you sent me to kill aren't Ghoul haters...
topics.response_text: You weren't supposed to talk to them! You were just supposed to kill them!

topics.topic_text: I don't think so.
topics.response_text: Hey, that's your loss, smoothkin.

topics.topic_text: Not yet, but I'm working on it.
topics.response_text: Well? what are you waiting for?

topics.topic_text: I've reconsidered your offer. I'll kill those Ghoul-hating bigots for you.
topics.response_text: Excellent! Okay, here's a list of the guys and their last known locations.

topics.topic_text: Maybe. I don't know if I trust you.
topics.response_text: The feeling's mutual, smoothskin. But that never stopped a business deal.

topics.topic_text: Sure. People like that don't deserve to live.
topics.response_text: Excellent! Take this sniper rifle. You'll need it.

topics.topic_text: Hey, anything for some extra caps.
topics.response_text: Excellent! Take this sniper rifle. You'll need it.

topics.topic_text: I don't like where this is headed.
topics.response_text: Forget it. I guess you aren't the right type.

topics.topic_text: Okay. What's the plan?
topics.response_text: Not everyone is as sympathetic to Ghouls as you are. In fact some humans are downright bigots.

topics.topic_text: What do you have against these guys?
topics.response_text: They're Ghoul haters. I want them all dead. Don't you think that's enough?

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: You're lying. I bet you didn't have the guts to kill him.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Underworld?
topics.response_text: It's a place for Ghouls. Here we're just people, not monsters.

conversation.response_text: Yes! They're all dead! And I have the keys. The keys to the...are you still here? Get lost. I have a trip to plan.
Hey you. Ya, you. I want to talk to you.
If I thought there was a chance that it would be better than this slop, I'd do that. But as it stands, this is my only option.
Fine. I suppose I can choke down some of the squirrel stew.
